Q1. (3 Marks) Classify the following variables as categorical/numerical and further classify as logical, nominal, ordinal, binary, continuous or discrete. Give the R data type that corresponds to each.

Age of a person
Gender of a person
Number of job applications made before employment
Time between becoming unemployed and finding a new job
Level of satisfaction with customer service (scale 1-10)
Party voted for at the last election
